vote.title:
A public hearing to receive comments regarding an application for and an ordinance granting an amendment for Specific Use Permit No. 2068 for a bar, lounge, or tavern on property zoned Tract A within Planned Development District No. 269, the Deep Ellum/Near East Side District, on the east corner of Main Street and Exposition Avenue
Recommendation of Staff:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended conditions
Recommendation of CPC:  Approval for a five-year period, subject to amended conditions 
Z234-102(LG)
